Definition: Given an English-language product review, you must determine whether it is positive or negative. A positive review is one where the product's review has a positive tone, and a negative review is one where the tone of the product's review is negative.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: The story line didn't make much sense and left me very disappointed even though the writing itself seems pretty good. Definitely want a part 2 or 3! This book just seemed like a quick fix after all of my favorite books were already completed.

I loved the first two. This one is a huge disappointment. Everything was predictable so no surprise. The characters have changed from where they were. Even Sam seems less than she used to. It seemed that Ms. Day had some great ideas for story lines but didnt quite know how to use them effectively. And now it seems like there going for more of her "christian philosophy" so its not really an inspirational book. Sorry......... very disappointing. Very disappointed.

I bought this as a replacement for the charger shipped with the Nikon S9200. The charging light blinks while connected. However, when you unplug it, the battery dies in less than 20 minutes. It doesn't seem like it's really a genuine Nikon.

I bought a 3 pack and every single one of the protectors are scratched. It did not protect my iPod. Very disappointed! Don't buy it.. you will just waste your money. Maybe they send me damaged ones? I'm gonna take it to apple store see how much it'll be worth. :( DO NOT BUY! SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!!

The title of this item is very misleading. I have found nothing more than "basics" to be offered in the recipes. It was not what I had expected from a new book. A cookbook that would teach you how to do all kinds of things for your family, but most importantly - recipes where there are no preservatives. There were a few things, such as a banana bread recipe and one on my favorite dessert, carrot cake recipe. But those weren't worth paying for. I'm sorry I bought it.

this product is good at keeping your hand from slipping into the hot pot but it seems a bit bulky also needs something between thumb and palm to keep fingers clear of the heat in handle. I ended up using silicon pads on both hands just for added protection with more absorbancy. This would be great if you cook over low heat. Other than that it served its purpose.

I'm not sure what I bought this product for, but I've gone with the cheaper options and have been more pleased. The sound quality is good enough if you're going to sit in front of it. There were no instructions included so it's impossible to figure out how much volume or distance you can turn up without adjusting any setting... there are four settings. That's all for the basic functions though - which was why a headphone jack on the back wasn't an option... that's basically pointless.
